fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.title: Fabric Shield Lib Config
fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.enchantab: Convention: 15 = Wood || 5 = Stone || 14 = Iron || 10 = Diamond || 22 = Gold
fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.universal: If on, whenever any shield gets disabled, every type of shield will be disabled.
If off, then disabling a shield will only disable shields of the same type
fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.block_del: Block Delay Seconds - The amount of time (in seconds) that use must be held before successfully blocking attacks.
fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.cooldown_: Cooldown Ticks - The amount of in-game ticks a shield go on cooldown when disabled by and axe
fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.damage_re: Damage Reduction Types - Any number of damage type(s) to block.
Damage Reduction Base - The constant amount of damage to be blocked.
Damage Reduction Percent - The percent of the dealt damage to be blocked.
Damage Reduction Blocking Angle â€” The maximum angle between the users facing direction and the direction of the incoming attack to be blocked.
fabricshieldlib.midnightconfig.item_dama: Item Damage Threshold - The minimum amount of damage dealt by the attack before item damage is applied to the item
Item Damage Base - The constant amount of damage applied to the item, if threshold is passed.
Item Damage Percent: The percent of the dealt damage that should be applied to the item, if threshold is passed.
